mapper.select: SELECT a.title ,b.board_file_no ,b.file_name FROM brd_reference_ptnr a, brd_reference_ptnr_file b WHERE a.board_no = b.board_no AND a.board_no = #{board_no} ORDER BY b.board_file_no

SELECT board_no, user_no, getTopMbrBscUserName(user_no) user_nm , ptnr_id, getTopPtnrBscPtnrName(ptnr_id) ptnr_name , title_classify, getCodeValue('brd_notice_top', 'title_classify', title_classify) title_classify_nm , type_classify, getCodeValue('brd_reference_ptnr', 'type_classify', type_classify) type_classify_nm , year_classify, title, contents, reg_ip , reg_date, DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(reg_date), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') reg_date_fmt, view_cnt FROM brd_reference_ptnr WHERE board_no = #{board_no} ORDER BY board_no DESC

SELECT board_file_no,board_no,file_path,file_name , reg_date, DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(reg_date), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') reg_date_fmt , CONCAT(file_path, file_name) encodedFilePathName FROM brd_reference_ptnr_file WHERE board_no = #{board_no} ORDER BY board_file_no
mapper.update: UPDATE brd_reference_ptnr SET view_cnt = view_cnt + 1 WHERE board_no = #{board_no}
UPDATE brd_reference_ptnr SET contents = REPLACE(contents,#{oldStr},#{newStr}) WHERE board_no = #{boardNo}
